about_the_game:
Hello all!

This short demo of Azarine Heart will run for about 30 minutes to allow a healthy amount of immersion into Acadia. Certain things have been trimmed out, such as the introduction, which is summed up through a text-based dialogue instead, to allow for the longest playtime possible!

Otherwise, please sit back, relax, and enter into the wicked and melancholy world that is Weyland, as you search for your missing sister. Explore dangerous caves, ravines, and dungeons, enter lovely, quaint towns (that may or may not have internal corruption right under the surface...), and get to know the strange, and sometimes dangerous, citizens that will charm, annoy, and otherwise endear you with their unique personalities.
